tool_description: These APIs provide data of all cryptocurrencies, markets, ideal for tracking prices and exchange rates.
name: Investing - Cryptocurrency Markets
title: Investing - Cryptocurrency Markets

api_list.name: coins/list-pairs

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

api_list.name: coins/get-news
api_list.description: Get news relating to specific cryptocurrency

required_parameters.name: pair_ID
required_parameters.description: Value of pair_id field returned in coins/list, coins/search, coins/list-pairs, etc...

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

api_list.name: coins/get-technical
api_list.description: Get technical information of specific cryptocurrency

required_parameters.name: pair_ID
required_parameters.description: Value of pair_id field returned in coins/list, coins/search, coins/list-pairs, etc...

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

api_list.name: coins/search
api_list.description: Search for available cryptocurrencies relating to a word, name, etc...

required_parameters.name: string
required_parameters.description: A word or name of any currencies

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

api_list.name: coins/get-analysis
api_list.description: Get analysis opinion from expert for specific cryptocurrency

required_parameters.name: pair_ID
required_parameters.description: Value of pair_id field returned in coins/list, coins/search, coins/list-pairs, etc...

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

api_list.name: coins/get-fullsize-chart
api_list.description: Get fullsize chart of specific cryptocurrency

required_parameters.name: pair_ID
required_parameters.description: Value of pair_id field returned in coins/list, coins/search, coins/list-pairs, etc...

optional_parameters.name: pair_interval
optional_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed 60 (1min)|300 (5min)|900 (15min)|1800 (30min)|3600 (1h)|18000 (5h)|86400 (1d)|week (1w) |month (1m)

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

api_list.name: coins/get-historical-data
api_list.description: Get historical data of specific cryptocurrency

required_parameters.name: pair_ID
required_parameters.description: Value of pair_id field returned in coins/list, coins/search, coins/list-pairs, etc...

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

optional_parameters.name: interval
optional_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed  day|week|month

api_list.name: coins/get-markets
api_list.description: Get market information of specific cryptocurrency in specified currency

required_parameters.name: cur2
required_parameters.description: The value of edition_currency_id returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

required_parameters.name: pair_ID
required_parameters.description: Value of pair_id field returned in coins/list, coins/search, coins/list-pairs, etc...

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

api_list.name: coins/get-overview
api_list.description: Get overview information of specific cryptocurrency

required_parameters.name: pair_ID
required_parameters.description: Value of pair_id field returned in coins/list, coins/search, coins/list-pairs, etc...

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

api_list.name: get-meta-data

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

api_list.name: get-ico-calendar

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value of icoData/categories returned right in this endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple options. For example : _ico_cat_gaming,_ico_cat_ecomm,_ico_cat_finance,_ico_cat_healthcare

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

optional_parameters.name: tabname
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : upcoming|completed|ongoing

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed related_days | name | funds_raised | completed

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

api_list.name: coins/get-brief-chart
api_list.description: Get brief information chart of specific cryptocurrency

required_parameters.name: pair_ID
required_parameters.description: Value of pair_id field returned in coins/list, coins/search, coins/list-pairs, etc...

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

optional_parameters.name: range
optional_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed d|w|1m|1y|5y|max

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

api_list.name: currencies/list

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

api_list.name: coins/list

required_parameters.name: edition_currency_id
required_parameters.description: The value of edition_currency_id returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

optional_parameters.name: total_volume_min
optional_parameters.description: Check rangeFilters/total_volume/steps field returned right in this endpoint for available min and max value

optional_parameters.name: chg_24h_min
optional_parameters.description: Check rangeFilters/chg_24h/steps field returned right in this endpoint for available min and max value

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

optional_parameters.name: total_volume_max
optional_parameters.description: Check rangeFilters/total_volume/steps field returned right in this endpoint for available min and max value

optional_parameters.name: chg_7d_max
optional_parameters.description: Check rangeFilters/chg_7d/steps field returned right in this endpoint for available min and max value

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

optional_parameters.name: chg_7d_min
optional_parameters.description: Check rangeFilters/chg_7d/steps field returned right in this endpoint for available min and max value

optional_parameters.name: market_cap_max
optional_parameters.description: Check rangeFilters/market_cap/steps field returned right in this endpoint for available min and max value

optional_parameters.name: market_cap_min
optional_parameters.description: Check rangeFilters/market_cap/steps field returned right in this endpoint for available min and max value

optional_parameters.name: chg_24h_max
optional_parameters.description: Check rangeFilters/chg_24h/steps field returned right in this endpoint for available min and max value

optional_parameters.name: volume_24h_max
optional_parameters.description: Check rangeFilters/volume_24h/steps field returned right in this endpoint for available min and max value

optional_parameters.name: volume_24h_min
optional_parameters.description: Check rangeFilters/volume_24h/steps field returned right in this endpoint for available min and max value

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed NAME_UP (Name) | PERC1D_DN (Chg 24h) | PERC7D_DN (Chg 7D) | MARKETCAP_DN (Market Cap) | VOLUME24_DN (Vol 24h) | TOTAL_VOLUME_DN (Total vol)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

api_list.name: currencies/get-rate
api_list.description: Get exchange rate between two different currencies

required_parameters.name: fromCurrency
required_parameters.description: Value of currency_ID field returned in currencies/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: toCurrency
required_parameters.description: Value of currency_ID field returned in currencies/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: time_utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC value in seconds, for example : utc+8 -> 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800

optional_parameters.name: lang_ID
optional_parameters.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint
